front.title: A Network Virtualization Overlay Solution using EVPN

abstract.t: This document specifies how Ethernet VPN (EVPN) can be used as a Network Virtualization Overlay (NVO) solution and explores the various tunnel encapsulation options over IP and their impact on the EVPN control-plane and procedures. In particular, the following encapsulation options are analyzed: VXLAN, NVGRE, and MPLS over GRE. This specification is also applicable to GENEVE encapsulation; however, some incremental work is required which will be covered in a separate document. This document also specifies new multi-homing procedures for split-horizon filtering and mass-withdraw. It also specifies EVPN route constructions for VxLAN/NvGRE encapsulations and ASBR procedures for multi-homing NV Edge devices.
